aadhaar-sc-post-count: since the Indian Supreme Court decided to set up a constitutional bench on to examine if Aadhaar project violates Indian Constituition

aadhaar-sc-privacy: We are thankful to 9 judge bench in  affirming unanimously that privacy is indeed a fundamental right.
